metadata.Description: Artificial intelligence techniques that can generate new content, such as images, music, or text.

subelement_relations.Description: Machine learning is a subfield of generative AI that focuses on the development of algorithms and models that allow computers to learn and make predictions or decisions without being explicitly programmed.

Deep learning is a subfield of generative AI that uses artificial neural networks to model and understand complex patterns and relationships in data, enabling machines to perform tasks such as image and speech recognition.

Natural language processing is a subfield of generative AI that focuses on the interaction between computers and human language, enabling machines to understand, interpret, and generate human language.
Computer vision is a subfield of generative AI that deals with how computers can gain high-level understanding from digital images or videos, enabling machines to analyze and interpret visual data.
Reinforcement learning is a subfield of generative AI that focuses on how machines can learn to make decisions and take actions in an environment to maximize a reward, using trial and error.
